summary: An optimistic and inept window cleaner fully 'satisfies' his customers, bed hopping from one unsatisfied housewife to another, until he meets a successful female police officer, who will have none of his sexual advances.
cast: Robin Askwith|Anthony Booth|Sheila White|Dandy Nichols|Bill Maynard|Linda Hayden|John Le Mesurier|Joan Hickson|Katya Wyeth|Richard Wattis|Melissa Stribling|Anita Graham|Sam Kydd|Brian Hall|Christine Donna|Sue Longhurst|Olivia Munday|Judy Matheson|Elaine Baillie|Christopher Owen|Peter Dennis|Marianne Stone|Andee Cromarty|David Rose|Totti Truman Taylor|Frank Sieman|Anika Pavel|Hugo De Vernier|Bruce Wightman|Carole Augustine|Lionel Murton|Peter Fontaine|Jeannie Collings|Claire Russell|Jo Peters|Monika Ringwald|Porjai Nicholas|Derek Lord|Robert Longden|Jennifer Westbrook|Glenda Allen|Ava Cadell|Zoe Hendry|Petula Noble|Rosetta Tropea
title: Confesiones de un limpiaventanas
